message: 如果台灣能有個App發展出來 即時宣導解說政策 並提供公民有個健康理性討論的平台能有多好 :)
story: HM Chen shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Pia Mancini and her colleagues want to upgrade democracy in Argentina and beyond. Through their open-source mobile platform they want to bring citizens inside the legislative process, and run candidates who will listen to what they say.
name: How to upgrade democracy for the Internet era
caption: ted.com
